sentences.cn: 他不知咕哝了些什么东西。
他说的是一种无法听得懂的方言.

sentences.en: Her speech was so slurred as to be almost incomprehensible.
sentences.cn: 她的声音含糊不清，几乎让人听不明白。

sentences.en: His explanation was incomprehensible to me.
His pronunciation was incomprehensible to most of us.
sentences.cn: 他的发音我们大多数人很难听懂.

sentences.en: His signature was an incomprehensible scrawl.
sentences.cn: 他的签字是令人看不懂的涂鸦.

sentences.en: I find his attitude quite incomprehensible.
sentences.cn: 我发现他的态度令人费解.

sentences.en: I find your attitude quite incomprehensible.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你的态度很难理解。

sentences.en: It is incomprehensible that they were admitted to the program.
sentences.cn: 他们竟也获准参与这个项目,真是不可思议.

sentences.en: Latin verse remained completely incomprehensible to me.
sentences.cn: 拉丁语的诗歌我仍然一点都不懂.

sentences.en: legal documents full of incomprehensible jargon
sentences.cn: 满是难懂术语的法律文件

sentences.en: She found his accent virtually incomprehensible.
sentences.cn: 她发觉几乎听不懂他的口音.
她咕噜着回答了些令人费解的话.

sentences.en: Some application forms can be incomprehensible to ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 有些申请表格一般人可能看不懂。

sentences.en: The word eternity represented itself with all its incomprehensible additions.
sentences.cn: “永生”这个字带着它所有神密的意义出现.

sentences.en: To the lay mind, these technical terms are incomprehensible.
sentences.cn: 对外行人来讲, 这些技术术语是无法理解的.
你的话真是令人百思不解.

words.tran_cn: 范围狭小的，范围不广的；理解不深的，没有理解力的
不可理解；不可知性；不可思议

trans.tran_cn: 难以理解的，难懂的，莫测高深的，不可思议的，无限的
